LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_PowerArmor_NoFuel.label: Symbiotic Musculature Malnutrition
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_PowerArmor_NoFuel.descript: The symbiotic musculature is malnourished due to a lack of nutrients, which negatively affects the host.
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_SpiderOne_PowerArmor_MainH: A special living structure of the Arachnae Swarm. Although it possesses most of a biological organism's organs, it lacks intelligence. It can merge with a Node-Pawn's nervous system, becoming equipment similar to power armor. The symbiotic musculature provides the host with additional heavy weapons and is also equipped with numerous miniature armed organs, allowing the Arachnae swarmite to wield power comparable to a human tank.
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_SpiderOne_PowerArmor_Aux.d: Auxiliary organs of the symbiotic musculature, providing the Node-Pawn with additional heavy mobility, and extra limbs during combat.
